mapper.select:
select count(*) FROM act_hi_taskinst t LEFT JOIN act_re_procdef b ON t.PROC_DEF_ID_ = b.ID_ LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst e ON t.PROC_INST_ID_ = e.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN sys_user c ON e.START_USER_ID_ = c.username LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON c.dept_id = d.dept_id
and t.ID_ = #{id} and t.PROC_INST_ID_ = #{procInstId} and b.NAME_ LIKE '%'||#{processDefinitionName}||'%' and c.name LIKE '%'||#{startUser}||'%' and t.ASSIGNEE_ LIKE '%'||#{assignee}||'%' and t.START_TIME_ >= #{startTime} and t.END_TIME_ <= #{endTime} and d.name LIKE '%'||#{cntAdminDep}||'%' and t.DELETE_REASON_ = 'completed'
